text: @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse Because you lie & your press conferences are a danger & hazard for the American people! Pushing a drug not approved by FDA to treat Covid19 because it will fatten your bank account! Desperate measures for a man who will leave the WH soon. https://t.co/c6AwPQBrHm
